properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Little River Inlet to Murrells Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Murrells Inlet to South Santee River SC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 2 at 2:35PM EST until February 3 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt expected.
Seas will build to 4-6 feet this evening.

* WHERE...Northeast South Carolina coastal waters.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 3 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EST MONDAY
